org.dyn4j.geometry.hull

Interface HullGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DivideAndConquer, GiftWrap, GrahamScan, MonotoneChain

    public interface HullGenerator
    Represents an algorithm used to create a convex hull of a given point set.
    Since:
    2.2.0
    Version:
    3.0.1
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2[] generate(Vector2... points)
      Returns the points of the convex hull generated from the given point set.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        Vector2[] generate(Vector2... points)
        Returns the points of the convex hull generated from the given point set.

        The resulting point set may not have the correct winding. Use the Geometry.getWinding(Vector2...) and Geometry.reverseWinding(Vector2...) methods to get and set the winding direction.

        Parameters:
        points - the point set
        Returns:
        Vector2[] the convex hull vertices
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if points is null or contains null points
